name: Dominoes Republic
description:
Have fun playing dominoes with your friends anywhere in the world at anytime with this amazing and simple free game and share good time with them.

This dominoes game is made to play with a partner, with the player in front of you, except in free for all modes. In this mode who should win is you! All info on the domino game is presented on a board each time a round ends. You can see all the statistics of your profile, such as games won, lost, etc.…

In offline, you can play domino in classic, Latin or Free For All mode. In multiplayer, you can play in classic and Latin modes with your friends or random players.

Create private matches to play dominoes with your friends, it includes a lot of functionality:

- There can be up to 16 players in a private room.
- Choose the classic or Latin mode.
- Choose the individual or team blocked game calculation.
- Set the domino game up to 200 points!
- Players can take a seat on a table or choose a spectator mode and watch the game Live!
- The private match include 2 ways of communication. Chat and Voice!! , like they're really playing domino next to you

Couldn't you get into the game on time? Did you have to take a call? Don't worry because you can join the game at any time with your friends.

You can also play dominoes with bots or play online with random players from other countries, get different colored and shape tiles, set the background and configure the game in different languages.

The dominoes game also includes a notebook to record points if you are in real life with your friends.

Download for free the best domino game! And enjoy a good time playing.

If you love this game and need support, you also have the information to contact in the game and help you or clarify in anything you need to work for a better dominoes game. All suggestions are welcome!!

Subscriptions are now available to remove ads and play domino without commercial interruptions:

• Auto-renewable subscription
• 1 week ($0.99), 1 month ($1.99), 3 months ($4.99), 6 months ($8.99) and 1 year ($16.99)
• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Privacy policy: https://www.slhapps.com/dominorepublicprivacy.html
Terms of use: https://www.slhapps.com/dominorepublictermcondition.html
